attributes.action: change the law to make it an officially illegal offense to use derogative names for the romany and traveller community, such as 'pikey' and 'gypo',in the media (in print or spoken) and in schools (by pupils or teachers)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Other racist terms are not allowed to appear in newspapers or tolerated in school, yet words like 'chav', 'pikey' and 'gypo' are considered acceptable slang by many, and not even racist! In particular we would like to see newspapers who use these words, especially when in used in headlines that imply bigoted opinions based on speculation and 'tarring everyone with the same brush', to be fined  with the money then going towards charities that help with school support for romany children and to fund access to the internet for them on sites to give them the educational advantage their peers have and to help broaden their opportunities in life.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
